title: A Little Late
author: JGray
text:
Keith IM'd me last night and told me I was a sadist. Six panels, each with multiple characters, all interacting. Apparently, that's an inking nightmare. However, he soldiered on long past when I passed out from exhaustion and delivered the page to my email. It was waiting for me this morning and, thus, I am posting it now. I apologize for it being late.

We're coming up on the end of chapter 4! There's a few more pages left and then we'll take a break and move onto chapter 5.

Just a reminder! You can follow Mysteries of the Arcana on Comic Rocket. You can also follow me on Twitter.

See you Thursday!

replies.author: TC*Guest*
replies.text: I am having on of those moments where I wished I could draw/colour beyond flats.  You know, make things easier on y'all.  But that's the Southern hospitality talking.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Theresa seems a bit lonely in the last panel...

replies.author: the leaking pen*Guest*
replies.text: Yeah...  I'm a writer partnering with an artist as well.  the comic we currently work on is OOTS style, so even crowd scenes aren't TOO bad, but the new comic we are working on, is a bit more detailed.  Some scripts i look at and think...  he's gunna KEEEELL me.
